name: check-iterable
description: A toolbox to check if an object is iterable, an iterator or a generator, etc.

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm link @babel/core && mv index.js index.mjs && babel --presets @babel/env -o index.js index.mjs
scripts.pretest: tsc test/index.ts --module commonjs --target es2015 && npm run prepublishOnly

author: A-yon Lee <the@ayon.li>
